From Kubernetes Pod:

/ # nslookup emnify.com
Server:         127.0.0.1
Address:        127.0.0.1#53

Non-authoritative answer:
Name:   emnify.com
Address: 52.219.74.198

From Instance dnsmasq:

root@ip-10-0-0-192:/etc# cat /etc/resolv.conf
# Dynamic resolv.conf(5) file for glibc resolver(3) generated by resolvconf(8)
#     DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE BY HAND -- YOUR CHANGES WILL BE OVERWRITTEN
nameserver 127.0.0.1
search eu-west-1.compute.internal
root@ip-10-0-0-192:/etc# service dnsmasq
Usage: /etc/init.d/dnsmasq {start|stop|restart|force-reload|dump-stats|status}
root@ip-10-0-0-192:/etc# service dnsmasq status
● dnsmasq.service - dnsmasq - A lightweight DHCP and caching DNS server
   Loaded: loaded (/lib/systemd/system/dnsmasq.service; enabled; vendor preset: enabled)
  Drop-In: /run/systemd/generator/dnsmasq.service.d
           └─50-dnsmasq-$named.conf, 50-insserv.conf-$named.conf
   Active: active (running) since Thu 2019-08-29 19:45:07 UTC; 44s ago
  Process: 2754 ExecStop=/etc/init.d/dnsmasq systemd-stop-resolvconf (code=exited, status=0/SUCCESS)
  Process: 2836 ExecStartPost=/etc/init.d/dnsmasq systemd-start-resolvconf (code=exited, status=0/SUCCESS)
  Process: 2825 ExecStart=/etc/init.d/dnsmasq systemd-exec (code=exited, status=0/SUCCESS)
  Process: 2822 ExecStartPre=/usr/sbin/dnsmasq --test (code=exited, status=0/SUCCESS)
 Main PID: 2835 (dnsmasq)
    Tasks: 1
   Memory: 412.0K
      CPU: 39ms
   CGroup: /system.slice/dnsmasq.service
           └─2835 /usr/sbin/dnsmasq -x /var/run/dnsmasq/dnsmasq.pid -u dnsmasq -r /var/run/dnsmasq/resolv.conf -7 /etc/dnsmasq.d,.dpkg-dist,.dpkg-old,.dpkg-new --local-service --trust-anchor=.,19036,8,2,49aac11d7b6f6446702e54a1607371607a1a41855200fd2ce1cdde32f24e8fb5 --trust-anchor=.,20326,8,2,e06d44b80b8f1d39a95c0b0d7c65d08458e880409bbc683457104237c7f8ec8d

Aug 29 19:45:07 ip-10-0-0-192 systemd[1]: Started dnsmasq - A lightweight DHCP and caching DNS server.
